ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Acl::Module###950_TicketStateWorkflow
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket-ACLs to define the following possible state.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflow
ConfigItem.Description: Settings for TicketStateWorkflow to define the following possible state. States have to be comma separated. placeholders are _ANY_ , _PREVIOUS_ and _NONE_.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflow::FallbackForPreviousState
ConfigItem.Description: Used ticket state, if "_PREVIOUS_" ticket state could not be determined. As key you have to define the ticket type + ":::" + current state OR the ticket type.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflow::DefaultTicketState
ConfigItem.Description: Settings for Default TicketState to define the following possible state.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflow::DefaultTicketQueue
ConfigItem.Description: Settings for DefaultTicket-Queue.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###130-ForceStateChangeOnLock
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket event module to force a new ticket state after lock action. As key you have to define the ticket type + ":::" + current state and the next state as content after lock action.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###700-TicketStateWorkflowTypeUpdate
ConfigItem.Description: Updates ticket state if configured or required after type update.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflow::ForceDefaultTicketState
ConfigItem.Description: Set a true-value for key (ticket type) if a type update forces a state update to the default state. The update is done whenever the original ticket state does not appear in the new ticket types workflow definition.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflow::PostmasterFollowUpState
ConfigItem.Description: The state if a ticket got a follow-up (use _PREVIOUS_ as placeholder for the very last state in ticket history before current).

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflow::PostmasterFollowUpCheckCustomerIDFrom
ConfigItem.Description: Checks if the sender of a follow-up message is contained in customer database an has an identical customer-ID as the ticket. If so, the email is considered as email-external, otherwise it is considered as email-internal. Default OTRS-behavior if disabled.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflow::PostmasterFollowUpCheckAgentFrom
ConfigItem.Description: Checks if the sender of a follow-up message is contained in agent database, and if so sets sender type "agent".

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###701-TicketStateWorkflowAutomaticStateAction
ConfigItem.Description: Moves ticket after state update.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflowAutomaticStateAction###NextStateSet
ConfigItem.Description: Automatically sets the state named by value if the state named in key is reached. Key may be prefixed by a certain ticket type name for which this state transition is valid only.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflowAutomaticStateAction###NextStatePendingOffset
ConfigItem.Description: If the automatically set state is a pending state, the pending offset time can be defined here (business minutes). Key must be the same as in NextStateSet.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::StateAfterPending
ConfigItem.Description: Define which ticket state should be set automatically (Value) after pending time of state (Key) has been reached. As key you can use the current ticket state OR the ticket type + ":::" + current state (more restrictive).

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflowAutomaticStateAction###QueueMove
ConfigItem.Description: Automatically moves ticket to configured queue if state is set - use of wildcards possible (e.g. <OTRS_TicketDynamicField1>).

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflowAutomaticStateAction###FallbackOnErrorNote
ConfigItem.Description: Choose to add a failure article to ticket, if target queue for automatic queue move does not exists.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflowAutomaticStateAction###FallbackOnErrorQueue
ConfigItem.Description: New ticket queue, if target queue for automatic queue move does not exists.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateWorkflowAutomaticStateAction###FallbackOnErrorState
ConfigItem.Description: New ticket state, if target state for automatic state change does not exists.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###910-TicketQueueMoveWorkflowTickettype
ConfigItem.Description: Updates ticket type if configured or required after queue move.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::TicketQueueMoveWorkflowTickettype
ConfigItem.Description: Defines Queue, TicketType and new TicketType for TicketQueueMoveWorkflowTickettype.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###920-TicketQueueMoveWorkflowState
ConfigItem.Description: Updates ticket state if configured or required after queue move.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::TicketQueueMoveWorkflowState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines Queue, TicketType and new State for TicketQueueMoveWorkflowState.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###900-TicketStateAutoUpdate
ConfigItem.Description: Updates ticket state after unlock ticket based on selected ticket type.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateAutoUpdate###NonOverridableTicketStateOnUnlock
ConfigItem.Description: Settings for TicketState to define the following possible state. States have to be comma separated.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateAutoUpdate###NonOverridableTicketStateOnLock
ConfigItem.Description: Settings for TicketState to define the following possible state. States have to be comma separated.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateAutoUpdate###DefaultTicketStateOnUnlock
ConfigItem.Description: Settings for Default TicketState to define the default following possible state on unlock.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketStateAutoUpdate###DefaultTicketStateOnLock
ConfigItem.Description: Settings for Default TicketState to define the default following possible state un lock.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###900-TicketUnlockOnStateUpdate
ConfigItem.Description: Performs ticket update actions after state update - currently limited to state update.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketUnlockOnStateUpdate###ValidStates
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which state will unlock the ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###701-StateUpdateOnWebrequestFollowUp
ConfigItem.Description: State update for closed tickets if a new article of type webrequest is created in customer interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###955-RemoveArticleFlagsOnTicketClose
ConfigItem.Description: Performs ticket update actions after state update - currently limited to state update.
